mapper.insert: insert into seer_reply_praise (praise_id, praise_reply_id, praise_user_id, praise_time) values (#{praiseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{praiseReplyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{praiseUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{praiseTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select praise_id, praise_reply_id, praise_user_id, praise_time from seer_reply_praise
